## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0dedb748fdfbcb9cc005a4e9ec9073affe14748c8e29a930fa91b5bf1e969680)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'src_core-instance_index_ts' @ 7.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
